settings.name: Start date of breeding season.
settings.description: Insert/Select a start date of your animals' breeding season. Narrowly specified breeding season windows give better results. Note that the year of this provided date is irrelevant.

settings.name: End date of breeding season.
settings.description: Insert/Select an end date of your animals' breeding season. Narrowly specified breeding season windows give better results. Note that the year of this provided date is irrelevant.

settings.name: Duration of a nesting cycle
settings.description: Insert the duration (in days) of a complete nesting attempt, i.e. the time until the young have successfully hatched.

settings.name: Size of the buffer to compute location revisitation
settings.description: Insert buffer radius (m) within which locations shall count as nest revisits. This often relates to your general location inaccuracy (GPS e.g. 30 m)

settings.name: Minimum number of points wihtin a buffer
settings.description: Insert the minimum number of points within a buffer that need to fall within the buffer for a point to be considered as a potential nest candidate.

settings.name: Minimum number of fixes for a day to be retained if no nest visit was recorded.
settings.description: Define the minimum number of fixed locations that have to be available in a day with no visits for that day to be retained when counting consecutive days visited. (i.e. missed visit due to data sparseness)

settings.name: Minimum number of consecutive days visited
settings.description: Define the minimum necessary number of consecutive days visited in the longest series to be considered breeding attempt.

settings.name: Minimum percentage of fixes at a location on the day with maximum attendance
settings.description: Define the minimum necessary percentage of fixes at the location on the day with most visits to be considered a breeding attempt.

settings.name: Minimum percentage of days spent at a location between the first and last visit
settings.description: Define the minimum percentage of days a buffer location has to be visited between the days of the first and last visit to be considered breeding attempt.

settings.name: Discard overlapping
settings.description: Select if you want to select only one breeding attempt if the found nests temporally overlap. Default: true
